titleStmt.title: The case of the auditors and receivers of His Majesties revenue with some reasons against transferring the receipt and accompts of the augmentation-revenue from them to the sheriffs and the pipe. And a brief survey of the mischiefs which will ensue the alteration designed, both as to his Majesties advantage, and the subjects interest.

The case of the auditors and receivers of His Majesties revenue with some reasons against transferring the receipt and accompts of the augmentation-revenue from them to the sheriffs and the pipe. And a brief survey of the mischiefs which will ensue the alteration designed, both as to his Majesties advantage, and the subjects interest.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
